price: Bütün çiftleri O yaratmıştır. Ve size bineceğiniz gemiler ve hayvanlar vâretmiştir ki,
arabic: وَٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلۡأَزۡوَٰجَ كُلَّهَا وَجَعَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡفُلۡكِ وَٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمِ مَا تَرۡكَبُونَ

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhī khalaqa al-azwāja kullahā wajaʿala lakum mina al-ful'ki wal-anʿāmi mā tarkabūna
